projects.title: Information site
projects.descr: In the summer of 2019 I taught myself React.js. I made this site while learning, so that I had a project to apply the things that I had learned. The goal was to make a website where I found the information that I needed in a day. Some of the websites I visited the most was to get updateded on the news, to check the weather and to check what football games that were being played today. Therefore I made a website that has all this information on one website.

projects.title: Portfolio site
projects.descr: A simple website I made with React.js to easily present the projects that I have done. Made it to have a portfolio with my most relevant projects.

projects.title: API for projects
projects.descr: An API that provides data for two projects that I have made. It collects data from other APIs, such as news data, weather data and football data. It was made with Python and Flask

projects.title: TODO list with React.js
projects.descr: A simple TODO list I made. It was the very first project I built with React.js. Simply followed a youtube tutorial on how to kmake a TODO list in React.js

projects.title: Small weather station for my desk
projects.descr: A small weahter station that is made with a ESP8266 and an OLED display, and written in Arduino. The OLED display shows the current temperature and weather type. The data is fetched from the API that is explained above, and the display gets updated about every 30 minutes.
